name: Ooze Pits
description: A series of pools and chambers contain dangerous oozes, slimes, and other amorphous creatures that can dissolve flesh and metal. The ooze materials can have unique properties useful for alchemy or crafting, while the acidic nature and ability to dissolve almost anything create constant danger.
atmosphere: Pools of living ooze bubble and writhe with malevolent intelligence. Air carries acid, decay, and something that defies natural law scent. Skin burns with presence of creatures that can dissolve flesh and metal. Taste of fear and acid fills mouth. Weight of amorphous creatures and constant dissolution makes heart race with terror.
